name: Parallel (itch) (James F)
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for United Game Jam 2020 Controls

Esc - Pause

E - Interact

A/Right arrow key - Move Right

D/Left arrow key - Move Left

TAB - Swap Character

Am I a Beginner?

This is my first ever game jam! I created this game alongside a team of 6, only 4 of which who are actively studying games design. We have been studying for just over a year.

Game Engine

We have used Unity to create this game.

Assets Used:

Main Theme/ Music

UI Sounds/Ambience

Pixel art space background
